title: STMS Management at Samsung
overviewContent: Management of the STMS (Samsung Tooling Management System) at Samsung, located in South Korea, involves overseeing and coordinating the various tooling processes and systems to ensure efficiency and productivity across operations.

jd: Installing, configuring, diagnosing, upgrading, and troubleshooting in-house systems by controlling and monitoring them
Performing maintenance on the in-house systems to ensure the availability of the IT operations infrastructure
Assisting with system enquiries from end-users
